name: It's a Girl Thing! Princess In Love
name_original: It's a Girl Thing! Princess In Love
description:
As Queen-to-be Isabella, you will live the royal life and wear the crown you’ve always dreamed of. Learn to choose the right dress for every royal occasion and mind your manners at the table like true royalty.

  • Customize Isabella by selecting her dresses, accessories and more!
  • Mind your P’s & Q’s – you’ll need to learn everything that every good princess should know!
  • Be on the lookout for your Prince Charming as you master dance steps to win him over.
  • Find your prince charming as you master dance steps to win over one of the six handsome princes at the ball.
  • Play 12 mini-games including “Create A Menu”, “Press Flowers” and “Seating Arrangement”.
